DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine efficacy phytosterol esters omega-3 ( Vayarol ) versus Omega-3 acid ethyl ester reduce triglyceride level hypertriglyceridemia patient fast triglyceride level ≥ 200 < 500 mg/dL .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Phytosterol Esters Omega-3 ( Vayarol ) Versus Omega-3 Acids Ethyl Esters Reducing Triglyceride Levels
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female , age > 18 year 2 . Triglycerides ≥ 200 mg/dL < 500 mg/dL 3 . Ability give write informed consent 1 . Female patient pregnant breastfeeding planning become pregnant 2 . Fasting plasma glucose ( FPG ) level > 110 mg/dL 3 . Type 2 diabetes mellitus poorly control ( glycosylated hemoglobin [ HbAlc ] > 8.0 % 4 . Patients use lipid alter drug exclude use Simvastatin , Atorvastatin , Rosovastatin 6 week 5 . Patients use product contain omega3 fatty acid dietary supplement potential lipid alter effect 6 . History bariatric surgery currently weight loss drug . 7 . Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 140/90 ) 8 . Subjects secondary cause hypertriglyceridemia : alcoholism , dysglobulinemia , thyroid disease poorly control ( TSH < 0.35 TSH > 5.5 ) 9 . Subjects abnormal level liver enzyme ( twice normal level ) 10 . Suffered ischemic event myocardial infarction , cerebrovascular accident angina pectoris last 6 month 11 . Uncontrolled endocrine metabolic disease know influence serum lipid lipoproteins cushing syndrome 12 . Gastrointestinal disease may influence lipid metabolism celiac , crohn , colitis malabsorption problem 13 . Subjects malignancy . Subjects basal cell carcinoma disease free least 3 year eligible study . 14 . Consumption one fish serving ( 200 gram ) sea food x2 week . 15 . HIV infection history 16 . History hypersensitivity allergy fish , fish oil soy 17 . BMI≥35 18 . Weight change > 3 kg runin period 19 . Any reason , opinion investigator , prevents subject participate study compromise patient
